headers.value: default-src 'self' https://www.gstatic.com https://apis.google.com https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.googleapis.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.gstatic.com https://apis.google.com https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.googleapis.com https://*.firebaseio.com wss://*.firebaseio.com;
